snippet.title: Minute of Islands - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Minute of Islands by Studio Fizbin is coming for PC, Mac and consoles in 2021.
⭐ Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1049710/Minute_of_Islands/ or https://www.gog.com/game/minute_of_islands

Explore strange and wonderful islands and dark labyrinths below in this narrative puzzle platformer. Guide young mechanic Mo on her quest to repair a world on the brink of collapse. The powerful Omni Switch at your disposal may not be enough to fix the damage that hides beneath the surface...

https://www.minute-of-islands.com



** Please note that due to some critical technical issues, we had to postpone the release date we originally aimed for! **

#indiegame #minuteofislands
